dc_creator_sm: New York City Department of City Planning
dc_description_s: NY Community Districts is a polygon theme representing the Community Districts of New York City.  Community Districts are mandated by the city charter to review and monitor quality of life issues for New York City neighborhoods.  Attribute data from the New York City Department of City Planning includes the Community District number and the perimeter and area of the district.  Additional attributes were added so that the layer would be able to work with data downloaded from Infoshare Online, namely the Infoshare district identifier and area name.
dc_publisher_s: New York City Department of City Planning
